phrases: Cute homemade cookies are perfect for gifts.
How about making a lot and inviting some friends over for a home cafe?
I have been watching you for a while, but what are you doing?
Are you trying to curse someone?
You are making sweets, are not you?
Why would you make sweets when you do not have any friends?
<For Example, When You are On Your Break>
Creating a Conversation with Homemade Cookies...
Why do not we eat them together?
I would love to eat your cookies again.
Let us make them together next time.
I cannot let Umaru-san eat these.
I will keep them just in case, and make new ones.
I will make Master's cookies first.
Oh, the bags are in my room.
I hope Master will be happy.
Sheesh, you should really be more up-front with these things.
Do not just leave them here without saying anything.
You made these for me, right?
You should have added a little more sugar, though.
Kirie-chan said those are for you, Onii-chan.
It is rare for you to invite me over, Ebina-chan.
I saw some chocolates at the store,
so I thought it might be nice to make some homemade ones.
I was just in the mood for chocolates.
From Friendship Chocolates to Chocolates For Your Crush
We will just whip some up and...
I will be right back, Ebina-chan.
Onii-chan was home, so I brought him over.
You know, I was in the middle of doing laundry...
Chocolates look hard to make, so help us out.
You would prefer it if I were not here, right, Ebina-chan?
I know how to make them,
but it is probably better if just the girls do it...
I will try putting kakinotane in the chocolates.
There is No Way That would Taste Bad
If you do not put too much energy
into decorations and flavors, you can make homemade chocolates in no time.
You chop it up, melt it, form the shapes,
you could try out different things when you are melting the chocolate.
If you make truffles, you can use whipping cream.
If you make raw chocolate, you can use starch syrup.
you melt regular chocolate to make homemade ones so you can give them as gifts,
but you are not just mixing things in to change what type of chocolate it is.
You are also mixing your feelings for the recipient into them.
I thought it might be nice to make some homemade ones.
I wonder if Ebina-chan wants to give them to someone.
originally began when people crushed cacao beans and ate them.
Chocolate as we know it today came to Japan by way of Spain.
He is giving a speech now...
Mix in your feelings for the recipient...
Wh-Wh-Wh-What am I going to do?
Now I have to write his name...
What did you put in there?
You sure that is going to be okay?
It tastes amazing when you eat them together.
These two together are a combination that cannot go wrong.
Do not blame me if it is gross.
If you are going to be like that, I will not give you any, even if it is good.
I do not even like chocolate that much.
Well, I did the same thing.
I wonder what anime I should watch this season.
I have been waiting for this!
Thank goodness I just happened to visit an anime store today.
I had no idea there was an Anumate here...
The new Puri Kyura merchandise is out already!
These were not here the last time I came.
Which means she must come here often.
TSF-san, since we are here, why do not we look around some more?
I Want to Go Back to Mars Soon...
Since we are done shopping, want to sit down over there?
There were so many things I wanted, I bought way too much.
I am glad you like anime, TSF-san.
Japanese anime is so cute and cool.
Oh, so you two must watch it together at home.
O-Onii-sama thinks of me as his meek little sister,
so for him to see me watching anime or playing games...
Her face is as red as it was back then.
I have an older brother, too.
So we are not just comrades in gaming,
but we are both little sisters, too!
But my Onii-chan does not watch anime or anything.
You should cook with him, UMR-san.
At first, I did not really understand anime,
but it is easy to fall in love with something that your loved one likes.
I must get home immediately, or I will be in trouble.
So we are not just comrades in gaming,
but we are both little sisters, too!
I guess I will make dinner.
All right, Onii-chan, I am off.
Do not be out too long.
I am sure she will be right back...
She did not have an appointment?!
Oh, I forgot to say it a while back, but thank you for the cookies.
Though they were a little burnt.
I thought she would been able to talk more recently,
but maybe she cannot really talk when Umaru's not around.
Kirie-chan did not get to hang out with Umaru.
I-I am sorry about the cookies...
I accidentally gave you the burnt ones!
That is why she came over today.
I won so much at the arcade that I got back late.
She came here to hang out with you.
You are home awfully late, are not you?
It is okay, is not it, Kirie-chan?
I think you should have come home sooner, as well.
But it was there before I fell asleep!
She is exerting so much energy over pudding...
I am sure you just ate...
I cannot accuse someone without any evidence.
I have to set a good example for Umaru.
Umaru, we are going to find out where the pudding went!
It would be easier to just buy a new pudding,
but we must reveal the truth first.
But I did not eat it.
Explain the reasons you did not eat it.
First, I fell asleep before I could eat the pudding.
That is because I received a message
from you saying that you would be home late.
You must have eaten it, then!
Here are some leftover potato chips.
Pudding is dessert that should be eaten last.
Eating pudding before my potato chips
But it does not seem like she is lying.
Could she have actually not eaten it?
what time did you come home last night?
Yesterday, I got out of work late, and went home on the last train...
Thank you for all your hard work.
Onii-chan, those are not your pajamas, are they?
You fell asleep in them, did not you?
I-It is true that I was really tired last night,
Come to think of it, I do not remember much...
Onii-chan hobbles home from work, exhausted.
Wait, I was not that tired.
So if there is pudding on the table when he returns home,
it is inevitable that he would eat it!
Are not all these representations of me kind of awful?
Let us actually eat some pudding.
If one of us ate it, that might jog our memories.
Why did you make those, Onii-chan?
You could have just bought some.
Did not I promise you I would make some?
Umaru, I am putting the pudding in the fridge.
I am going to eat it now.
Hey, do you know how to make pudding, Onii-chan?
I guess I will make some sometime.
You were the one who ate it, were not you?
Hey, will you make me pudding again sometime, Onii-chan?
You were the one who ate it, right?
Pudding ice cream is not the best, but pudding daifuku is good.
Though they will make me fat.
I want to try pudding dorayaki, too, I think!
Episode 10 Umaru and Now and Once Upon a Time
It is been a while since I have done a preview.
We have used all the main characters already,
so it is always tough to decide who should do it.
Why did not all of you girls just go in rotation?
I can see you did not even think of that.
